citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
In January 2024, the IACUC conducted the semi-annual facility inspection by still photographs emailed to all members for
approval. Facility inspections must be conducted in person by at least 2 members of the IACUC, provided no one who
wants to participate is excluded. In person inspections allow for a thorough and complete assessment in real time and
attention to detail that can be lacking in still photographs. Correct by ensuring at least 2 members of the IACUC conduct
in-person facility inspections at the next semi-annual review, no later than July 31, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).

approval. Facility inspections must be conducted in person by at least 2 members of the IACUC, provided no one who 
wants to participate is excluded. In person inspections allow for a thorough and complete assessment in real time and 
attention to detail that can be lacking in still photographs. Correct by ensuring at least 2 members of the IACUC conduct 
in-person facility inspections at the next semi-annual review, no later than July 31, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
